/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of vehicles, including cars and motorcycles, indicating a busy urban environment. Buildings of different sizes and designs flank the street, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. In the distance, power lines stretch across the sky, a common sight in many cities. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the blend of urban and natural elements in the cityscape.
